title: "Survey: General Counsel Expect Significant Increase in Technology Investments and Artificial Intelligence Adoption"
excerpt: "In addition to growing openness toward AI use, 77% of respondents said they have plans to make new technology investments this year, a more than 20-point increase over the previous year’s report. Among those who didn’t have budget earmarked to purchase new tools, some were looking for ways to optimize and enhance existing technology."
